TopicTitle: Is anyone doing a mission after seeing today's Google doodle?

Articles.Content:
I saw today's Google Doodle... And I recognized her, Sally Ride. I didn't know today would have been her birthday, but seeing that right after a introspective memorial day hit me right \*there\*. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Anyone planning a mission in her memory today?

Oh, for the record, yes I watched it live... My teacher when I was a kid sat and talked with us after. I think this is part of why I am so damned protective of my kerbals.

> 
> I saw today's Google Doodle... And I recognized her, Sally Ride. I didn't know today would have been her birthday, but seeing that right after a introspective memorial day hit me right \*there\*. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> Anyone planning a mission in her memory today?
> 
> Oh, for the record, yes I watched it live... My teacher when I was a kid sat and talked with us after. I think this is part of why I am so damned protective of my kerbals.

Watched what live? Sally Ride died of pancreatic cancer in 2012...on earth...in San Diego...
I think you are mistaking her for Christa McAuliffe who died in the Challenger shuttle.
R.I.P. Sally Ride. May she truly rest in peace.

> 
> Watched what live? Sally Ride died of pancreatic cancer in 2012...on earth...in San Diego...

I think Merv DeGriff is confusing Sally Ride with Christa McAuliffe, the school teacher who was aboard Challenger.
The doodle with the shuttle in the background looks like an Mk3 Cokpit to me...![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> I think Merv DeGriff is confusing Sally Ride with Christa McAuliffe, the school teacher who was aboard Challenger.

Yes, I was and I feel like a Derp now. I'll go collect my dunce cap... but I blame fatigue from a psudo-monday at work. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Yes, I was and I feel like a Derp now. I'll go collect my dunce cap...

Get one for me please; I don't know what a 'Google doodle' is.

(But if it's the specialised logo they do for various events, it says nothing about Sally Ride here. Probably just one of those things that only means anything to citizens of the United States)

It was yesterday's Google doodle.

Happy landings!

> 
> (But if it's the specialised logo they do for various events, it says nothing about Sally Ride here. Probably just one of those things that only means anything to citizens of the United States)

Well, we are the most important people on the planet.
Also, Google is a U.S.-based company.

[https://www.google.com/doodles/sally-rides-64th-birthday](https://www.google.com/doodles/sally-rides-64th-birthday)

I didn't see it the other day, but perhaps yes, I shall attempt to create a shuttle and do something with it. I haven't bothered with shuttles yet. Plus, the lack of a Canadarm (in stock) makes the mission unpossible?
